name: HousingInsecurityOrInstabilityAndHomelessness
title: Housing Insecurity or Instability and Homelessness
description: Determination of whether the person has limited or uncertain access to stable, safe, adequate, and affordable housing. If homeless, indication of whether sheltered or unsheltered.  (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Housing Insecurity or Instability and Homelessness.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person has limited or uncertain access to stable, safe, adequate, and affordable housing. if homeless, indication of whether sheltered or unsheltered. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Housing Insecurity or Instability and Homelessness.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Housing Insecurity or Instability and Homelessness.)
